revised_title: Super-Riemannian Space Quantization and its Implications
tldr: The author presents a study of quantizing super-Riemannian space, focusing on the physical content of curved super-space-time at the classical and quantum level. They derive formal field quantization and perturbation theory rules, proving the theory finite in perturbation theory for various models. However, ghost problems and a poorly defined singular limiting process hinder its usability in its current form.
